description: Your religion is both a shield and a weapon in battle.

sections.description: Ability to cast divine spells, domain or mystery class feature.

sections.text: You gain a +1 bonus on initiative checks and a +2 bonus on concentration checks made to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability when casting defensively or while grappled.
